organisation_name: European Association for Directors and Providers of Long-Term Care Services for the Elderly (E.D.E.)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar

Position papers 
Bi-Annual European congresses 
Quarterly newsletter 
Projects

goals__remit: The E.D.E. is an international umbrella organisation representing national associations for directors and providers of long-term care services in Europe. One of its major tasks is to promote the exchange of information and experience among its members and facilitate mutual learning. As professionals we seek to improve the quality of care and supervision. To do so it is important to look beyond our own "national noses". Common training standards, reciprocal visits and observation, congresses and symposia all foster professionalism among care home directors and a greater understanding of the various forms of care and assistance. Currently we represent 26 National Associations from residential long term care which stands for approx. 8.000 nursing homes with more than 800,000 clients across the Europe.
